00037 class CSwordBibleModuleInfo : public CSwordModuleInfo  {
00038 public: 
00039     enum Testament {
00040         OldTestament = 1,
00041         NewTestament = 2
00042     };
00043         
00047     CSwordBibleModuleInfo( SWModule* module  );
00048     CSwordBibleModuleInfo( const CSwordBibleModuleInfo& m );

00060   virtual const unsigned int verseCount( const unsigned int book, const unsigned int chapter ) const;
00065   virtual const unsigned int chapterCount( const unsigned int book ) const;
00069   virtual QStringList* books();

00081   const bool hasTestament( CSwordBibleModuleInfo::Testament );

00083

00085     QStringList*    m_bookList; //This booklist is cached

00089 };
